author: Kiarendil
body:
Hello, 

this PR is to add a custom pdl file to the CMSSW. It is needed for the central production of Run-3 MC samples with D0 > pi+ pi- > mu+ mu- and K0s > pi+ pi- > mu+ mu- decays. 
The only change of the new pdl file is reducing the pion lifetime to make it 50 times smaller. 
This is needed in order to increase filter efficiency, since we require in our filter for the pions to decay within tracker volume.
W/o this change the filter efficiency is too low for the central production due to computing limitations (pions decay very far away from the tracker). 
No other changes in CMSSW are required, only addition of this new file. Local checks with the usage of this file as `particle_property_file = cms.FileInPath('./evt_2020_0.02_pi_lifetime.pdl')` were successful and increase filter eff by about two orders of magnitude.
Some details are discussed in the [CMSBPHMC-45](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSBPHMC-45) and [CMSBPHMC-26](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSBPHMC-26). 

Please also find below the output of the `diff evt_2020.pdl evt_2020_0.02_pi_lifetime.pdl` command:

```
20a21,22
> * 27/09/2023 Updated by K. Ivanov. Modified pi+- (211) lifetime to be 50 times smaller for the BPH rare D(K0s) -> pi+ pi- -> mu+ mu- studies
> *---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
164c166
< add  p Particle  pi-                             -211  1.3957061e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00    -3     0  7.8044971e+03       -211
---
> add  p Particle  pi-                             -211  1.3957061e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00    -3     0  1.5608994e+02       -211
257c259
< add  p Particle  pi+                              211  1.3957061e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00     3     0  7.8044971e+03        211
---
> add  p Particle  pi+                              211  1.3957061e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00     3     0  1.5608994e+02        211
```

If you need any additional info to approve and merge this PR, please ask and we will be happy to address it. 

Kind regards, 
Kirill for the BPH
title: BPH adding new pdl file for D(K0s) -> pi pi -> mu mu with modified pion lifetime
